scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run start --prefix client" "npm run dev --prefix server"
scripts.test: echo "No tests here. Did you mean to run tests in client or server directories instead?"

name: react-express-ts-master-2
description: This structure can be used to build a React front end with an ExpressJS back end and provides a way to work in development by running a React Dev Server along with the API backend, and also to run a unified back end/front end when pushed to Heroku. It also includes TypeScript for both client and server.
